itunes:title: #FBF - Tarot For Entrepreneurs
title: #FBF - Tarot For Entrepreneurs
description:
If you’re wanting to dip your toe into some practices you can use in your business, this chat with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot is a great start. Emily and Kathleen ask Brigit to bust some common myths about tarot. Plus, she shares ways that you can bring this intuitive practice into your business in a way that feels aligned for you. If you want to hear more of this conversation, check out Episode 94 - Tarot in Business with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot >>

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
